THE PLACE

Quinta de Villa Franca ('QVF') is located in the heart of Peso da Régua. This location site is one of the most important areas of the Douro Valley wine region, a characteristic to which we may add a great proximity of all the facilities offered by the city of Peso da Régua. Although in the center of the city, in our house you’ll find a quiet place to spend restful days where time always seems to move more slowly.

PAST

Since 1709, QVF has welcomed several generations of our family. The main activity of this farm has always been the viticulture and the consequent production of Port wine for the great houses of the region.

In 1968 the interior of the main house is renovated and a modern winery is built by the architect Jorge Gigante (1919-1994).

PRESENT

Cristina and Susana welcome QFV in their estate with a very well-preserved house and a small vineyard. As the difficulties affecting small wine growers in the Douro are well known, viticulture is now an activity of residual dimension for the family.

Thus, since 2021, in a common effort, QVF started to be open to everyone who wants to get to know the region and explore the very special nature of the Douro region, and at the same time, spend a few days of rest in a place with a very quiet and familiar environment.

FUTURE

The project to open and share QVF to the public is a fresh start to a future in which we intend to foster a closer connection by the members of this family to the nature, the countryside interior of Portugal and to the Douro region. There are new challenges ahead and many news to be presented soon.

LOCATION

Rua de Vila Franca, 29
5050-266 Peso da Régua

Driving access through Av. Dr. Manuel de Arriaga.
